page.title: 11FINE SHEEPSKIN FACTORY.
page.content: INVOLVED HAS CERTAINLY NOT DIMINISHED OVER THE YEARS. THE RAW MATERIAL IS STILL THE SAME ENGLISH DOMESTIC SHEEP, BRED OVER MANY CENTURIES TO CULMINATE IN AN ANIMAL THAT IS THE BEST IN THE WORLD FOR MAKING THE FAMOUS "EXMOOR"STYLE MOCCASIN AND EACH SKIN IS STILL HAND PICKED IN THE RAW STATE. THE THINGS THAT THEY MAKE WERE RUGS, HATS,BOOTEES,THE COLOURS LEATHER, COGNAC WOOL, COGNAG LEATHER. THE RAW SKIN IS WASHED IN PADDLE VATS BEFORE BEING PICKED AND TANNAGE. THE SKIN ARE TOGGLED ON TO FRAMES TO DRY TO RETAIN THEIR NATURAL SHAPE AND SIZE. DEGREASING THE SKINS IN A TYPE OF DRY CLEANING MACHINE TO REMOVE MOST WET.
